overview: Nora Nord, Sweden's sexiest porn star in a collection of hot stories.  Restaurant orgy - Nora pays the bill in a very special way.  Schoolmates - Nora & Maya skip school to have sex.  Have you sat my cat? - Nora spins loose properly.  The visitor - Think how much fun you can have with an unexpected guest  Nora & Dee Dee - It can be really fun to explore your best friend's nooks and crannies.
title: Den Perfekta Blondinen
